# io-spin

[![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/io-spin.png?downloads=true&stars=true)](https://nodei.co/npm/io-spin/)

Little terminal spinner lib for Node.js and io.js

## Installation

```bash
$ npm install io-spin
```

## Example

```javascript
spin.start('Downloading:', 'Spin1')
spin.restart('Computing:', 'Box1')
spin.stop()
spin.destroy()
```
